string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/missionId
string.annotation: Mission identifier

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productType
string.annotation: Product type

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productVersion
string.annotation: Product version

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/lookDirection
string.annotation: Look direction can be left or right

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/orbitPassDirection
string.annotation: Orbit direction can be ascending or descending

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referenceZeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time of reference RSLC product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryZeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time of secondary RSLC product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/referenceZeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time of reference RSLC product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/secondaryZeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time of secondary RSLC product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedDatatakeId
string.annotation: List of planned datatakes included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedObservationId
string.annotation: List of planned observations included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isUrgentObservation
string.annotation: List of booleans indicating if datatakes are nominal or urgent

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/listOfFrequencies
string.annotation: List of frequency layers available in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/diagnosticModeFlag
string.annotation: Indicates if the radar mode is a diagnostic mode or not: True or False

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isGeocoded
string.annotation: Flag to indicate radar geometry or geocoded product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/boundingPolygon
string.annotation: OGR compatible WKT representation of bounding polygon of the image

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingType
string.annotation: NOMINAL (or) URGENT (or) CUSTOM (or) UNDEFINED

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/listOfPolarizations
string.annotation: List of processed polarization layers with frequencyA

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/sceneCenterAlongTrackSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal along track spacing in meters between consecutive lines near mid swath of the RIFG image

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/sceneCenterGroundRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal ground range spacing in meters between consecutive pixels near mid swath of the RIFG image

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed range bandwidth in Hz

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth in Hz

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/centerFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the processed image in Hz

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of grid. Same as difference between consecutive samples in slantRange array

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Time interval in the along track direction for raster layers. This is same as the spacing between consecutive entries in the zeroDopplerTime array

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/slantRange
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with slant range

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with azimuth time

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/HH/wrappedInterferogram
real.annotation: Interferogram between HH layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/HH/coherenceMagnitude
real.annotation: Coherence magnitude between HH layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/VV/wrappedInterferogram
real.annotation: Interferogram between VV layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/interferogram/VV/coherenceMagnitude
real.annotation: Coherence magnitude between VV layers

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/numberOfSubSwaths
integer.annotation: Number of swaths of continuous imagery, due to transmit gaps

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/validSamplesSubSwath1
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 1st subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/validSamplesSubSwath2
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 2nd subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/validSamplesSubSwath3
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 3rd subswath

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/validSamplesSubSwath4
integer.annotation: First and last valid sample in each line of 3rd subswath

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of offset grid.

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Along track spacing of the offset grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/HH/slantRangeOffset
real.annotation: Slant range offset

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/HH/alongTrackOffset
real.annotation: Along track offset

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/HH/quality
real.annotation: Cross-correlation quality metric for HH pixel offset layers

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/VV/slantRangeOffset
real.annotation: Slant range offset

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/VV/alongTrackOffset
real.annotation: Along track offset

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/VV/quality
real.annotation: Cross-correlation quality metric for VV pixel offset layer

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/slantRange
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with slant range

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/swaths/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: CF compliant dimension associated with azimuth time

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/epsg
integer.annotation: EPSG code corresponding to coordinate system used for representing geolocation grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/coordinateY
real.annotation: Y coordinate in specified EPSG code

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/coordinateX
real.annotation: X coordinate in specified EPSG code

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/incidenceAngle
real.annotation: Incidence angle is defined as angle between LOS vector and normal at the target

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/losUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of unit vector of LOS from target to sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/losUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of unit vector of LOS from target to sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of unit vector along ground track

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of unit vector along ground track

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/elevationAngle
real.annotation: Elevation angle is defined as angle between LOS vector and norm at the sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/secondaryZeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time of corresponding pixel in secondary image

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/secondarySlantRange
real.annotation: Slant range of corresponding pixel in secondary image

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/parallelBaseline
real.annotation: Parallel component of the InSAR baseline

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/perpendicularBaseline
real.annotation: Perpendicular component of the InSAR baseline

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range values corresponding to the geolocation grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero Doppler time values corresponding to the geolocation grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/groundTrackVelocity
real.annotation: Ground track velocity needed to convert azimuth offsets in pixels to meters

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/geolocationGrid/heightAboveEllipsoid
real.annotation: Height values above WGS84 Ellipsoid corresponding to the location grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/referencePhase
real.annotation: Constant wrapped reference phase used to balance the interferogram

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VV/referencePhase
real.annotation: Constant wrapped reference phase used to balance the interferogram

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/bulkSlantRangeOffset
real.annotation: Bulk slant range offset used to align reference and secondary image

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/bulkAlongTrackTimeOffset
real.annotation: Bulk along track time offset used to align reference and secondary image

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/referenceTerrainHeight
real.annotation: Reference Terrain Height as a function of time

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to processing information records"

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to processing information records"

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/effectiveVelocity
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Effective Velocity from imaging geometry

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler Centroid for Frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/reference/frequencyA/azimuthFMRate
real.annotation: 2D LUT of azimuth FM rate for Frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/effectiveVelocity
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Effective Velocity from imaging geometry

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler Centroid for Frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/secondary/frequencyA/azimuthFMRate
real.annotation: 2D LUT of azimuth FM rate for Frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: Common Doppler Centroid used for processing interferogram

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/dopplerBandwidth
real.annotation: Common Doppler Bandwidth used for processing interferogram

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/referenceFlatteningElevation
real.annotation: Reference elevation above WGS84 Ellipsoid used for flattening

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/interferogram/numberOfRangeLooks
integer.annotation: Number of looks applied in slant range direction

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/interferogram/numberOfAzimuthLooks
integer.annotation: Number of looks applied in along track direction

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/alongTrackSearchWindowSize
integer.annotation: Along track search window size for cross-correlation

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/slantRangeSearchWindowSize
integer.annotation: Slant range search window size for cross-correlation

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/alongTrackSkipWindowSize
integer.annotation: Along track skip window size for cross-correlation

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/slantRangeSkipWindowSize
integer.annotation: Slant range skip window size for cross-correlation

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/crossCorrelationMethod
string.annotation: Method used for generating pixel offsets

integer.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/common/frequencyA/pixelOffsets/correlationSurfaceOversampling
integer.annotation: Oversampling factor of the cross-correlation surface

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time corresponding to position, velocity, acceleration records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/position
real.annotation: Position vector record. This record contains the platform position data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/velocity
real.annotation: Velocity vector record. This record contains the platform velocity data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/acceleration
real.annotation: Acceleration vector record. This record contains the platform acceleration data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/orbit/orbitType
string.annotation: PrOE (or) NOE (or) MOE (or) POE (or) Custom

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time corresponding to attitude and quaternion records

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/quaternions
real.annotation: Attitude quaternions (q0, q1, q2, q3)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/angularVelocity
real.annotation: Attitude angular velocity vectors (wx, wy, wz)

real.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/eulerAngles
real.annotation: Attitude Euler angles (roll, pitch, yaw)

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/attitude/attitudeType
string.annotation: PrOE (or) NOE (or) MOE (or) POE (or) Custom

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/ISCEVersion
string.annotation: ISCE version used for processing

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/l1SlcGranules
string.annotation: List of input L1 RSLC products used

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/configFiles
string.annotation: List of input config files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/demFiles
string.annotation: List of input dem files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/orbitFiles
string.annotation: List of input orbit files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/attitudeFiles
string.annotation: List of input attitude files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/RIFG/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/auxcalFiles
string.annotation: List of input calibration files used

shape.name: numberOfDatatakes
shape.annotation: number of datatakes in product

shape.name: numberOfObservations
shape.annotation: number of observations in product

shape.name: numberOfFrequencies
shape.annotation: Number of L-SAR frequencies in product

shape.name: numberOfFrequencyAPolarizations
shape.annotation: Number of polarization layers associated with L-SAR frequency A

shape.name: frequencyASlantRangeWidth
shape.annotation: Number of pixels in all L-SAR frequency A imagery datasets

shape.name: frequencyAZeroDopplerTimeLength
shape.annotation: Number of lines in all L-SAR frequency A imagery datasets

shape.name: complexDataFrequencyAShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR frequency A imagery datasets

shape.name: realDataFrequencyAShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR frequency A imagery interferometric dataset

shape.name: offsetDataShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with Pixel Offset layers

shape.name: offsetSlantRangeWidth
shape.annotation: Number of pixels in Pixel Offset layers

shape.name: offsetZeroDopplerTimeLength
shape.annotation: Number of lines in all L-SAR frequency A imagery datasets

shape.name: validSamplesShapeFrequencyA
shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR frequency A valid samples dataset

shape.name: geolocationCubeShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with metadata cubes

shape.name: geolocationCubeHeight
shape.annotation: Height dimension of the metadata cube

shape.name: geolocationCubeLength
shape.annotation: Length dimension of the metadata cube

shape.name: geolocationCubeWidth
shape.annotation: Width dimension of the metadata cube

shape.name: dopplerCentroidTimeLength
shape.annotation: Length dimension of Doppler centroid grid

shape.name: dopplerCentroidSlantRangeWidth
shape.annotation: Length dimension of Doppler centroid grid

shape.name: dopplerCentroidShape
shape.annotation: Shape of the Doppler centroid grid

shape.name: calibrationTimeLength
shape.annotation: Length of calibration LUTs

shape.name: calibrationSlantRangeWidth
shape.annotation: Width of calibration LUTs

shape.name: calibrationScaleShape
shape.annotation: Shape of calibration LUTs

shape.name: antennaPatternComplexShape
shape.annotation: Shape of antenna pattern datasets

shape.name: orbitListLength
shape.annotation: description="Number of orbit state vectors

shape.name: orbitShape
shape.annotation: Shape of orbit state vector triplets dataset

shape.name: attitudeListLength
shape.annotation: Number of attitude state vectors

shape.name: attitudeQuaternionShape
shape.annotation: Shape of attitude quaternion dataset

shape.name: attitudeShape
shape.annotation: Shape of attitude Euler angle triplets dataset

shape.name: chirpWeightingFrequencyLength
shape.annotation: Shape associated with 1D filter representations in frequency domain

shape.name: numberOfInputL1Files
shape.annotation: Number of input L1 granules

shape.name: numberOfInputDEMFiles
shape.annotation: Number of input DEM files

shape.name: numberOfInputConfigFiles
shape.annotation: Number of input configuration files

shape.name: numberOfInputOrbitFiles
shape.annotation: Number of input orbit files

shape.name: numberOfInputAttitudeFiles
shape.annotation: Number of input attitude files

shape.name: numberOfInputAuxcalFiles
shape.annotation: Number of input calibration files
